document.full_text: lawmakers extended their probe into location tracking on mobile devices this week, asking apple inc and other developers to divulge how they use location data and scheduling a separate hearing on mobile privacy.
document.title: congress deepens apple location tracking probe
lines_and_colors: lawmakers extended their probe into location tracking on mobile devices this week, asking apple inc and other developers to divulge how they use location data and scheduling a separate hearing on mobile privacy.
